positive_examples: This is an example of security screening.
The security screening demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed security screening in this context.
A typical case of security screening would involve these features.
The concept of security screening applies here.
A security operation involving the systematic inspection of people, objects, or areas to detect threats or prohibited items.
negative_examples: This is an example of security patrol, not security screening.
This represents security operation in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: SecurityPatrol, or other types of SecurityOperation

definition: A process of examining persons or items to detect threats before access.
